events.COMMAND_IN_COOLDOWN_DAY: This command has a cooldown, be sure to wait for {0} day(s)
events.COMMAND_IN_COOLDOWN_HOUR: This command has a cooldown, be sure to wait for {0} hour(s)
events.COMMAND_IN_COOLDOWN_MINUTE: This command has a cooldown, be sure to wait for {0} minute(s)
events.COMMAND_IN_COOLDOWN_SECOND: This command has a cooldown, be sure to wait for {0} second(s)
events.BOT_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: {0} I need the `{1}` permission(s) to run this command.
events.MISSING_PERMISSIONS: {0} You need the `{1}` permission(s) to run this command.
events.MISSING_REQUIRED_ARGUMENT:
{0} Required argument is missed!
Use this model : `{1}{2} {3}`

allowSpam.CHANNEL_ALREADY_IGNORED_BY_ANTI_SPAM: The channel where you want to allow to spam is already ignored by anti spam.
allowSpam.CHANNEL_IGNORED_BY_ANTI_SPAM: The <#{0}> channel is ignored by the anti spam.
allowSpam.INVALID_CHANNEL_ENABLE:
The channel where you want to allow to spam must be a text channel
Follow the example : ``{0}allowspam <#channel>``
allowSpam.ANTI_SPAM_ALREADY_DISABLED: The channel where you want to disable the spam is already disabled.
allowSpam.CHANNEL_NOT_IGNORED_BY_ANTI_SPAM: The <#{0}> channel is not ignored by the anti spam.
allowSpam.INVALID_CHANNEL_DISABLE:
The channel where you want to disable the spam must be a channel
Follow the example : ``{0}allowspam <#channel> remove``

giveRoleAfterCaptcha.ROLE_GIVEN_AFTER_CAPTCHA: <@&{0}> will be given after that the captcha be passed.
giveRoleAfterCaptcha.INVALID_ARGUMENT:
The setup argument must be on or off
Follow the example : ``{0}giveroleaftercaptcha <role ID/off>``

minAccountAge.MINIMUM_ACCOUNT_AGE_ENABLED_DESCRIPTION: The minimal account age to join the server was updated.
minAccountAge.MINIMUM_ACCOUNT_AGE_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION: The minimal account age to join the server was disabled.
minAccountAge.INVALID_ARGUMENT:
The minimum account age must be a number (default = 24 hours)
Follow the example : ``{0}minaccountage <number (hours)>``
